name: basic 8ply (dk) boot socks
notes:
one of the best things about sock knitting is the sheer number of yarns that there is to choose from - not just in colours but in weights as well.  it means that you can knit a sock for all seasons, and for all occasions!

this pattern is for an 8ply (dk) sock using the winwick mum sockalong pattern so you can follow along with the free step-by-step tutorials to make the socks - ideal if you're a beginner!

you can find these tutorials at www.winwickmum.co.uk/sockalong
